channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: After long delays, Boeing's Starliner capsule and crew launch into space
item.description: After years of delay, Boeing's Starliner is flying people for the first time with two NASA astronauts heading to the International Space Station. The rocket lifted off from Cape Canaveral, Fla.
item.content:encoded:
After years of delay, Boeing's Starliner is flying people for the first time with two NASA astronauts heading to the International Space Station. The rocket lifted off from Cape Canaveral, Fla.

(Image credit: MIGUEL J. RODRIGUEZ CARRILLO/AFP via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Brendan Byrne

item.title: Hunter Biden’s ex wife and his former girlfriend testified in gun trial
item.description: Hunter Biden’s ex wife and his former girlfriend testified Wednesday in a Delaware courtroom about his drug use. His defense asked a FBI special agent about the contents of his infamous laptop.
item.content:encoded: Hunter Biden’s ex wife and his former girlfriend testified Wednesday in a Delaware courtroom about his drug use. His defense asked a FBI special agent about the contents of his infamous laptop.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Lucas

item.title: The arguments for swapping lawns for more natural landscaping
item.description: It’s lawnmower season but some homeowners and others say it’s time to shift from well-trimmed lawns to more environmentally friendly landscaping.
item.content:encoded: It’s lawnmower season but some homeowners and others say it’s time to shift from well-trimmed lawns to more environmentally friendly landscaping.
item.dc:creator: Teresa Homsi

item.title: A priest recalls what it meant went a nun traveled 5 hours to visit his dying father
item.description: On this week's "My Unsung Hero" from Hidden Brain, when Father Jim Martin's father was dying, a nun, Sister Janice Farnham, took a 5-hour train ride to visit him.
item.content:encoded: On this week's "My Unsung Hero" from Hidden Brain, when Father Jim Martin's father was dying, a nun, Sister Janice Farnham, took a 5-hour train ride to visit him.

item.title: After getting bashed in elections, South Africa's ANC is frantic to form a coalition
item.description: South Africa is in unchartered political territory as the ruling African National Congress look to other parties to try and shore up its majority after a historic loss of votes in last weeks election.
item.content:encoded: South Africa is in unchartered political territory as the ruling African National Congress look to other parties to try and shore up its majority after a historic loss of votes in last weeks election.
item.dc:creator: Kate Bartlett

item.title: Gaza's sick and malnourished children die as hospitals collapse from Israel's war
item.description: A lethal combination of displacement, disease and malnutrition are killing Gaza's children as they wither away without healthcare.
item.content:encoded: A lethal combination of displacement, disease and malnutrition are killing Gaza's children as they wither away without healthcare.
item.dc:creator: Aya Batrawy

item.title: In the Coast Guard's wargames, climate change is now a key adversary
item.description: The Coast Guard is holding it's strategic wargames at a base in Portsmouth, Va., and climate change is a key adversary.
item.content:encoded: The Coast Guard is holding it's strategic wargames at a base in Portsmouth, Va., and climate change is a key adversary.
item.dc:creator: Quil Lawrence

item.title: USAID says it will send $90 million in aid to Gaza
item.description: The U.S Agency for International Development says that it will be sending $90 million to aid Palestinians in Gaza. The announcement comes amid growing concerns of famine.
item.content:encoded: The U.S Agency for International Development says that it will be sending $90 million to aid Palestinians in Gaza. The announcement comes amid growing concerns of famine.
item.dc:creator: Megan Lim

item.title: Supplemental Security Income rules can limit the people the program is meant to help
item.description: Fifty-one years ago, Washington created a daring program to fight poverty. But instead of lifting people, it now traps them in poverty.
item.content:encoded: Fifty-one years ago, Washington created a daring program to fight poverty. But instead of lifting people, it now traps them in poverty.
item.dc:creator: Joseph Shapiro

item.title: What to expect from Biden’s border plan
item.description: Can the recent Biden’s executive order restricting asylum have a significant long-term impact in reducing the number of illegal crossings in the U.S. Southern border? We’re asking analysts and people following immigration trends. Jasmine Garsd.
item.content:encoded: Can the recent Biden’s executive order restricting asylum have a significant long-term impact in reducing the number of illegal crossings in the U.S. Southern border? We’re asking analysts and people following immigration trends. Jasmine Garsd.
item.dc:creator: Jasmine Garsd
